Unarmed.description: While Unarmed this model will suffer -1 to their Duel and To Wound rolls.

Spear.description:
A Spear is a Single-Handed weapon. Infantry models may assist friendly models with the same size base or smaller as long as they are in base contact. The model with a spear may then contribute a single attack to the Fight using its own Fight Value and Strength.

Models with a spear may use it as a hand weapon, but may not make special strikes when using it. In multiple combat the model using a spear may strike a different target to the model they are supporting.

Lance.description: A Lance is a Single-Handed weapon. Cavalry models using a Lance adds +1 to their To Wound rolls. (Other rules that allow for re-rolls on natural 1's apply before this bonus). This additional bonus applies to other Cavalry models as long as the model wielding the Lance charged this turn (and it is not within Difficult Terrain). Cavalry models will normally replace their Lance with normal Weaponry if dismounted.

War Spear.description: A War Spear is a Single-Handed weapon. A war spear follows the rules for spears for Infantry models, and lances for Cavalry models.

Sword.description: A Sword is a Single-Handed weapon.

Axe.description: A Axe is a Single-Handed weapon.

Pick.description: A Pick is a Single-Handed weapon.

Two-Handed Axe.description: A Two-Handed Axe is a Two-Handed weapon.

Whip.description: A Whip is a Throwing Weapon with a range of 2" and Strength 1

Pike.description:
A Pike is a Two-Handed weapon. Infantry models with pikes follow the same rules as spears, although models may support in base contact two models deep. Models supporting in this way will be unable to Back Away if they lose the combat.

Pikes require two hands to use and as such if a model is also equipped with a shield, bow or crossbow it will suffer a -1 penalty to Duel rolls.

Dagger.description: A Dagger is a Single-Handed weapon.

Staff.description: A Staff is a Single-Handed weapon.

Staff Of Power.description: A Staff Of Power is a Hand-And-A-Half weapon (declare its use as a Single-Handed or Two-Handed weapon before the start of a Fight), the bearer can expend 1 point of Will per turn without reducing their own Will store.

Banner.description: A banner doesn't count as a weapon and as such imposes a -1 penalty to duel rolls for the wielder. The Banner has a 3" range in all direction and allows for a single re-roll of a duel roll if a friendly model in the fight is within range. (1 re-roll per fight max). The Banner wielder must be standing to enable the banner effect, and may be passed to a friendly Warrior model if slain.

Elven Cloak.description: A model wearing an elven cloak gains the Stalk Unseen special rule.

War Drum.description: At the start of the Move Phase a model equipped with a War Drum may declare they are sounding the advance. All models within 12" of the drummer add 3" for Infantry or 5" for Cavalry / Fly to their maximum Move distance. Models affected by a War Drum may not Charge this turn.

War Horn.description: As long as one or more models have a War Horn on the battlefield all models in your force have +1 Courage.

Poisoned Blowpipe.description: Blowpipes have a range of 12" and a Strength of 2.

Bow.description: Bows have a range of 24" and a Strength of 2.

Crossbow.description: Crossbows have a range of 24" and a Strength of 4.

Dwarf Bow.description: Dwarf Bows have a range of 18" and a Strength of 3.

Dwarf Longbow.description: Dwarf Longbows have a range of 24" and a Strength of 2.

Elf Bow.description: Elf Bows have a range of 24" and a Strength of 3.

Esgaroth Bow.description: Esgaroth Bows have a range of 24" and a Strength of 3.

Great Bow.description: Great Bows have a range of 24" and a Strength of 4.

Longbow.description: Longbows have a range of 24" and a Strength of 3.

Orc Bow.description: Orc Bows have a range of 18" and a Strength of 2.

Short Bow.description: Short Bows have a range of 18" and a Strength of 2.

Slingshot.description: Slingshots have a range of 12" and a Strength of 1.

Throwing Spear.description: Throwing Spears have a range of 8" and a Strength of 3.

Throwing Weapon.description: Throwing Weapons have a range of 6" and a Strength of 3.

Uruk-Hai Bow.description: Uruk-Hai Bows have a range of 18" and a Strength of 3.

Armour.description: A model upgraded to wear Armour gains +1 Defence.

Heavy Armour.description: A model upgraded to wear Heavy Armour gains +2 Defence or +1 Defence if they are already wearing Armour.

Dwarf Armour.description: A model upgraded to wear Dwarf Armour gains +2 Defence or +1 Defence if they are already wearing Armour.

Heavy Dwarf Armour.description: A model upgraded to wear Dwarf Heavy Armour gains +3 Defence, +2 Defence if they are already wearing Armour or +1 if they are wearing Heavy Armour Or Dwarf Armour.

Shield.description: A model equipped with a shield gains +1 Defence unless they carrying a Bow, Crossbow, Two-Handed Weapon, Pike or using a Hand-And-A-Half Sword with Two hands.
